title: Hexadecimal to DWORD Converter
description:
HEX_TO_DWORD converts a hexadecimal string in a DWORD
value. Here only hexadecimal characters '0'..'9', 'a..f' and 'A'.. 'F' are interï¿¾preted, others occurring in HEX characters are ignored.
name: HEX_TO_DWORD

input.name: Hex
input.description: A hexadecimal string input with a maximum length of 20 characters.

return_value.description: The DWORD value that results from converting the hexadecimal input string.
